doc: List of SMARTS queries (space separated) that must be matched for molecule to be kept in the output collection.
List of SMARTS queries (space separated) that cause the exclusion of molecule from the output collection.

Use this option to request that each resulting molecule to be written in a specific file. The pathname of these files is constructed by adding an indentifier at the end of the value of OUTFILE parameter (before extension).

tag: the importing of chemical objects (e.g., molecular geometries)
